Dialogue: Hey. I know there’s a lot going on right now, but I think you should know that Interstellar implemented an efficiency system--a score of sorts.
Because how efficient you are is gonna determine if they keep you on the freelance roster or not. And we need you.
You ready to tell me why?
Soon. Trust me, if I told you now you wouldn’t believe me.
Look. Point is clearing as many of the Avanti and delivering packages in good condition will get you a higher rating. I’ll link the your ranking to your HUD so you know where you stand alright?
